Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: I had gone to this place for 4 years ago. I liked their PİZZA but i can not say same thing for the man giving pizza. I had wanted 2 napkins politely because of my flu , he had looked at me like i am his enemy.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Delicious and value for money. Love their 4 cheese pizza. Great for a quick snack as you can buy per slice. Love to eat there every now and then

Review Text: Had a slice of pizza here once was just about to leave and see this guy getting sick right next to me turned me off the food hopefully next time my experience is better for now it’s only a 1 ⭐️

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Fresh pizza better than pizza hut. Staff were alright and prices were a bit high, 8 euros for two slices, the taste made up for it though. The interior could be upgraded though, one couch was all ripped up.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: It was unexpected great experience in the middle of a touristic place. The food was so delicious and the service was amazing. The guy who’s working there is so cool and polite.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Loved the pizza here the meal deal was good value for a pizza and a choice of drink (we had chocomel cans) €10 will definatley return here tandoori chicken was very nice aswel as the other toppings would definatley recommend

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Value for Money, esay eat. Good taste and wonderful customer service. I really recommend that place for pizza lovers. Even the guy i thing his name Mahmoud he was really helpful and he recommended to us beautiful places to visit in Amsterdam.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Good and affordable. 2 slices of pizza and a drink for 8 euro

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: I fully rate this place for food quality and cleanliness too and serve is great too

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Very dirty and you have to pay to enter the bathroom which has no paper, and smells horribly. I didn't like it. The food is so so... A lot of onion and i asked them not to add it. I waited for my Pizza 30 minutes though it was not busy. The personal is nice though.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Great pizza. Would be 4 stars if they got their logistics right (sometimes you can't order because they're doing deliveries or they ran out of dough). Would be 5 stars of they took care of their interior and kept it a little cleaner. Food is great and cheap though

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: This is the best pizza I have ever had in my life and trust me, I have had a lot of pizza. The crust is GOLDEN brown and the texture is perfect, soft but also with a slight crunch. Diverse selections of toppings, though I jut went with the …

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Quick and affordable, nice staff. The pizza is okay, but you can't add anything and they have no bathroom. Good for quick easy bite on go though

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Very good pizza and really friendly staff. Pizza was warm, tasty, HALAL and delicious. I would love to have this place back home. Will come back to you everytime I will be in Amsterdam!

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Pay for toilets, no toilet paper, rude staff, pizza below mediocre! Avoid this place!!!!

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Today at around 02.50 I walked in to get a slice of pepperoni, after I paid I didnt received anything at all and the guy behind the counter told me that I hadn't paid and that I needed to get out. When someone tells you to get out of their …

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: The only people who could call this NY pizza have never eaten pizza in New York. The crust was all wrong and too thick. Decent, but not NY style. The garlic dipping sauce was not good, tasted like poor quality ranch.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Nice pizza but maybe a bit expensive, which unfortunately is normal for being in the center

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Order a medium pizza, and was kept waiting for half hour. When I checked after 15 minutes it was plain they forgot. Then served up some cold "pizza biscuit". I live local in Amsterdam, and most takeways are reasonable at worst. This one - avoid! Hygeine also suspect.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: The personnel was really kind and kept their promise. They promised to make me the best pizza of Amsterdam and he made me a chicken Buffalo which was really nice. At first i was sceptic because its a pizza with cheddar on the bottom, but it …

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Eh .  It's corporate lunch pizza.  Cardboard.  But if you are hungry, it fills the belly.  Beware, a bottle of water will likely cost you as much as one or two slices.  Staff is 50/50 from friendly vs pay and please move on.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Surprised to be able to order a gluten free pizza here. A quick in and out snack type of place. Service was fine, pizza was too.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Friendly staff, nice and warm pizza. Would recommend to every one. One of the few locations where you can get fine pizza in a nice atmosphere around Leidseplein
